air:Brand.Name: World Traveller
air:Brand.air:Title: World Traveller
WorldTvler
air:Brand.air:Text:
World Traveller is our full-service economy class on flights beyond Europe, packed with all the comfort and benefits you expect from British Airways at an affordable price. Your seat is ergonomically designed and comes with an adjustable headrest, lumbar support and recline.
• Great value all-inclusive fares with no hidden charges • Generous free baggage allowance • Delicious meals and full bar service • Personal entertainment system with complimentary headphones • Family-friendly features and kids' activity packs

air:Brand.Name: Economy Saver
air:Brand.air:Title: Economy Saver
ES
air:Brand.air:Text: Upgrade to Economy Saver to add flexibility, allow miles upgrades and increase baggage allowance on weight concept routes

EMIRATES PAID SEATS NOW BOOKABLE IN GALILEO Worldspan and Apollo paid seating launch dates to be announced shortly.
Economy Saver includes:
• Seating available at a fee* • Changes not permitted or at a fee • Non refundable both before and after departure • 35% flown miles earned • Mileage upgrade eligibility at time of check-in • Checked baggage included * • Hand luggage x 1 bag 7 KG • Complimentary Wi-Fi • Soft and Alcoholic refreshments • ICE entertainment
* Please refer to fare rules for full conditions

air:Brand.Name: Economy Smart
air:Brand.air:Title: Economy Smart
Econ Smart
air:Brand.air:Text: Enjoy more services and added legroom space with Economy Smart

Enjoy more services and added legroom space with Economy Smart
Kick back and relax in the cosiest Economy Class seats. Be served by an award-winning cabin crew that is the epitome of Malaysian Hospitality

air:Brand.Name: Economy Flex
air:Brand.air:Title: Economy Flex
EF
air:Brand.air:Text: Economy Flex offers FREE SEATING, additional flexibility and mileage accrual.

EMIRATES PAID SEATS NOW BOOKABLE IN GALILEO Worldspan and Apollo paid seating launch dates to be announced shortly.
Economy Flex includes:
• Free seat assignment • Changes permitted at a fee • Refunds permitted at a fee • 70% flown miles earned • Mileage upgrade eligibility • Checked baggage included * • Hand luggage x 1 bag 7 KG • Complimentary Wi-Fi • Soft and Alcoholic refreshments • ICE entertainment
* Please refer to fare rules for full conditions

air:Brand.Name: Economy Value
air:Brand.air:Title: Economy Classic
EV
air:Brand.air:Text: Upgrade to Economy Classic for a refund for a fee

The best inflight entertainment, selection of fine international cuisine, and warm Arabian hospitality. Welcome to Etihad Economy Class.
• 75% of Etihad Guest miles • Refer to fare rules for Refunds/Changes • Hand baggage x 1 bag at 7kgs • Upgrade eligibility • Neck pillows and soft fleece blankets • Tasty hot meals with a choice of three main courses, with vegetarian as standard • On board Cafe offering light snacks and a choice of teas, coffees and hot chocolate • Flying Nanny on board offering parents a helping hand on long-haul • Hundreds of hours of on-demand entertainment, on 10.6" screen with noise reduction headsets • Connectivity on board: Wi-Fi and mobile services • A range of connection ports at each seat, including USB and laptop power supply • Amenity kits with socks, eyeshades, earplugs, toothbrush and toothpaste on all long-haul and overnight flights. • Complimentary luxury coach services between Dubai / Al Ain and Abu Dhabi International Airport. • US Preclearance facility at Abu Dhabi Airport to pre clear US Immigration before guests board their flight to the US

air:Brand.Name: Economy Basic
air:Brand.air:Title: Economy Basic
Econ Basic
air:Brand.air:Text: Kick back and relax in the cosiest Economy Class seats. Be served by an award-winning cabin crew that is the epitome of Malaysian Hospitality
